meanings.definition: A cardinal number represented in the U.S. by 1 followed by 33 zeros, and in Great Britain by 1 followed by 60 zeros.
meanings.sent1: There are decillions of stars in the universe.
meanings.sent2: The concept of decillions can be mind-boggling.
meanings.sent3: I have decillions of chores to do before the party.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as vast as decillions.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with decillions of gold coins.

meanings.sent1: The possibilities are as endless as decillions.
meanings.sent2: He had to count decillions of grains of sand on the beach.
meanings.sent3: She had decillions of reasons to smile every day.
meanings.sent4: The crowd stretched for decillions of miles.
meanings.sent5: The library contained decillions of books waiting to be read.
